main event: A radar operator observed a stationary object on radar that changed colors and appeared visually at times.
interesting points: The object was detected on radar appearing higher than the surrounding terrain,It exhibited vivid colors including purple, red, amber, and white,The length of observation was approximately 3-4 minutes,The object was silent during the sighting,It was concluded that the sighting was probably caused by a balloon.
sighted object: a stationary object showing up on radar
